CustomField.description: This is a formula field because there is a workflow that otherwise calls more than the limit of 10 field updates (Order: recalculate contribution)
CustomField.formula: Total_Contribution_CHF__c - Contribution_Americas_CHF__c - Contribution_China_CHF__c - Contribution_EMEA_CHF__c - Contribution_Japan__c - Contribution_Korea_CHF__c - Contribution_RoA_CHF__c - Contribution_Taiwan_CHF__c - Contribution_India_CHF__c - Contribution_Australia_CHF__c
CustomField.inlineHelpText: Contribution that is assigned to Headquarters. Stored when order is closed.
CustomField.label: Contribution Corporate CHF
